sentence: Arizona Senator Mark Kelly and New Hampshire Senator Maggie Hassan proposed a pause on the federal gas tax, as the average price for a gallon of gas in the U.S. is over $3.45 a gallon, according to AAA, and could even rise higher.
author: Katie Wermus
title: With Gas Prices Averaging $3.45 a Gallon, 2 Senators Propose Halting Tax

sentence: One proposal, from a group of senators including Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., would suspend the federal gasoline tax for the rest of 2022.
author: Russ Wiles
title: Arizona gas prices are going up. Here's how to find the cheapest gas

sentence: In Arizona, where a Democratic senator, Mark Kelly, is vulnerable, prices are up by 50%.
title: Spiralling fuel prices add to Democratsâ€™ woes
